hero.title: Learn how they really work
hero.description: Understand React state, effects, and the render cycle. Learn to write predictable, scalable, and maintainable logic.

items.title: Fundamentals
items.text: Master the essential React base. These Hooks are 90% of what you will use daily to manage state and life cycles.

items.title: Advanced
items.text: Take your logic to another level. Learn to handle complex states, imperative references, and external synchronization.

items.title: Performance
items.text: Avoid unnecessary re-renders and improve experience with priority rendering and smart memoization.

items.title: Modern / React 19
items.text: The cutting edge of development. Master the new form APIs and optimistic states of the new era.

about.name: Diego Berrio
paragraphs: I spent many nights trying to understand why a useEffect would enter an infinite loop, why the state wouldn't update as expected, or why React seemed to do 'whatever it wanted'.
This platform was born from that frustration. Not to memorize Hooks, but to understand what is actually happening in every render.
My goal is to help you build that intuition that usually only comes after many mistakes.
